content: @Eric Huss do you have a sense of the timeline for stabilizing -Z features=itarget (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/7914)?
There is currently no timeline. There is a critical bug (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/8549) which needs to be fixed, and it may require substantial changes to how Cargo works internally.
Ah, ok, thanks for the link. I'll find a workaround for now then.
